column3: Latest;Battambang: A young Malaysian working in Poipet City has died.------Richard Ooi Boon Peng
column5: was taken to a Poipet hospital with severe lung problems
column6: and was sent to Mongkol Borei Referral Hospital------He was then transferred to a hospital in Battambang
column7: but did not recover.------His body was returned to Poipet City at 18:00 on March 19
